summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Flash Neiga driving theory test app. Backend APIs fully functional, authentication working, exam flow operational, training mode functional. Some frontend navigation issues identified.

navigation_issues.issue: Signs, Stats, and Admin pages not loading properly via navigation
Exam results page not displaying after finishing exam

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix navigation routing issues for Signs, Stats, and Admin pages. Investigate exam results display after finishing exam. All core functionality is working but some secondary pages need routing fixes.

success_percentage.frontend: 80% - Core features working, some navigation issues
